login.subtitle: Welcome back! Please sign in to your account

home.title: Welcome to CivicAid
home.subtitle: Your platform for civic engagement and community issues

hero.title: Making Communities Better Together
hero.subtitle: Report issues, track progress, and collaborate with local organizations to solve community problems
hero.description: Connect citizens with local organizations to report, track, and resolve civic issues. Transform your city through collaborative problem-solving and transparent governance.

reportIssues.title: Report Issues
reportIssues.description: Easily report community issues with photos and location data

trackProgress.title: Track Progress
trackProgress.description: Monitor the status of reported issues in real-time

collaborate.title: Collaborate
collaborate.description: Work with local organizations and government bodies

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Full transparency in issue resolution process

stats.title: Making a Real Impact
stats.subtitle: Join thousands of citizens who are already making their communities better

infrastructure.name: Infrastructure
infrastructure.description: Report issues with roads, bridges, water supply, electricity, and other infrastructure

environment.name: Environment
environment.description: Report pollution, waste management, and environmental concerns

safety.name: Safety
safety.description: Report safety hazards, crime, and emergency situations

transport.name: Transport
transport.description: Report issues with public transport, traffic, and transportation

health.name: Health
health.description: Report healthcare facility issues and medical emergencies

education.name: Education
education.description: Report issues with schools, colleges, and educational infrastructure

successStories.title: Success Stories
successStories.quote: CivicAid helped us resolve 95% of infrastructure issues within 48 hours, saving our city over $500K annually while improving citizen satisfaction by 40%.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to report issues, track progress, and engage with your community

realTimeReporting.title: Real-time Issue Reporting
realTimeReporting.description: Report civic issues instantly with location tracking, photo uploads, and detailed descriptions.

organizationManagement.title: Organization Management
organizationManagement.description: Connect with local organizations and government bodies for faster issue resolution.

analyticsDashboard.title: Analytics Dashboard
analyticsDashboard.description: Track progress, monitor trends, and gain insights into civic issues in your area.

communityEngagement.title: Community Engagement
communityEngagement.description: Collaborate with neighbors and local organizations to solve problems together.

securePrivate.title: Secure & Private
securePrivate.description: Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security and privacy controls.

globalImpact.title: Global Impact
globalImpact.description: Join a worldwide movement of citizens working together for better communities.

cta.title: Ready to Make a Difference?
cta.subtitle: Join CivicAid today and start building a better community

issues.title: Community Issues
issues.subtitle: Browse and track community issues
issues.createFirst: Be the first to report an issue

issueDetail.title: Issue Details
issueDetail.commentPlaceholder: Share your thoughts on this issue...

reportIssue.title: Report New Issue
reportIssue.subtitle: Help improve your community by reporting civic issues. Your report will be forwarded to the appropriate authorities for resolution.
reportIssue.descriptionPlaceholder: Provide detailed description of the issue
reportIssue.imageNote: Maximum 5 images allowed (optional). Supported formats: JPG, PNG, GIF
reportIssue.error: Failed to report issue. Please try again.

stepDescriptions.issueDetails: Provide basic information about the issue
stepDescriptions.locationInformation: Specify where the issue is located
stepDescriptions.mediaUpload: Add photos to help describe the issue

reportIssue.imageHelp: Clear images help in faster issue resolution
reportIssue.reviewMessage: Please review your issue details before submitting. Once submitted, you can track the status of your issue.
reportIssue.submitNote: By submitting this report, you agree that the information provided is accurate and you understand that authorities may contact you for further details if needed.

location.title: Location Details
location.description: Please provide the exact location where the issue is occurring. This helps authorities locate and resolve the problem quickly.
location.instructions: You can use the "Get Current Location" button to automatically fill in your coordinates, or manually enter the address and coordinates.

map.title: Google Maps Integration
map.description: Click on the map to select the exact location of the issue. This will help authorities locate and resolve the problem quickly.

media.title: Media Upload
media.description: Upload photos or documents related to the issue. Clear images help authorities understand and resolve the problem faster.

contactInfo.title: Contact Information
contactInfo.description: Provide your contact details so authorities can reach you for updates or clarification. You can choose to remain anonymous.
contactInfo.name: Full Name
contactInfo.anonymousReport: This report will be submitted anonymously

reportIssue.guestMessage: You can report issues without creating an account! Fill out the form below and submit your issue directly.
reportIssue.guestNote: Note: Creating an account allows you to track your reports and receive updates.

loginPrompt.title: Login Required
loginPrompt.message: To submit your issue, please login or create an account. This allows you to track the status of your report.

guestConfirm.title: Submit Issue as Guest
guestConfirm.message: You are about to submit this issue without creating an account. Your report will be processed, but you won't be able to track its status or receive updates.
guestConfirm.note: Would you like to create an account to track your reports, or continue as a guest?

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Your civic engagement overview
dashboard.noIssues: You haven't reported any issues yet
dashboard.noOrganizations: You're not a member of any organizations yet

footer.aboutText: CivicAid is a platform that connects citizens with local organizations to address community issues and improve civic engagement.
footer.description: Empowering citizens to report and resolve civic issues collaboratively. Building stronger communities through technology and citizen engagement.

chatbot.title: Siya - Your Civic Assistant
chatbot.placeholder: Ask me anything about civic issues...
chatbot.welcomeMessage: Hi there! üëã I'm Siya, your intelligent AI assistant for CivicConnect. I'm here to help you with reporting issues, finding organizations, and answering questions about civic engagement. I can provide detailed guidance, step-by-step instructions, and connect you with the right resources. How can I assist you today?

responses.greeting: Hello! üëã I'm Siya, your AI assistant for CivicConnect. I'm here to help you with reporting issues, finding organizations, and civic engagement. How can I assist you today?
responses.reportIssue: To report an issue: 1) Click 'Report an Issue' on the homepage 2) Select the appropriate category 3) Upload photos 4) Add location details 5) Describe the problem. Our system will route it to the right organization! üìù‚ú®
responses.findOrganizations: You can find organizations by visiting the 'Organizations' page. Browse by category, location, or cause. Each organization shows their focus areas, contact info, and activities. You can join organizations or create your own! üèõÔ∏èüë•
responses.reportIssueShort: To report an issue: 1) Click 'Report an Issue' 2) Select category 3) Add photos and location 4) Describe the problem 5) Submit. Our AI will route it to the right organization! üìù‚ú®
responses.findOrganizationsShort: Find organizations on the 'Organizations' page. You can filter by type, location, or cause. Each organization shows their focus areas and contact info! üèõÔ∏èüîç
responses.civicConnect: CivicConnect is a platform that connects citizens with organizations to report, track, and resolve civic issues. We help build better communities through collaborative problem-solving! üåüüèòÔ∏è
responses.community: To join a community: Browse organizations that match your interests, participate in discussions, volunteer for projects, or create your own organization. Together we build stronger communities! ü§ùüí™
responses.help: I'm here to help! üòä I can assist with: reporting issues, finding organizations, understanding CivicConnect, community engagement, and platform navigation. What would you like to know? üéØüí°
responses.features: CivicConnect features: Smart issue reporting, organization discovery, real-time tracking, community discussions, impact analytics, and collaborative tools! üöÄüìä
responses.technical: For technical issues: Check your internet connection, clear browser cache, refresh the page, or contact support. I can help with platform navigation and features! üîßüíª
responses.default: I can help you with: reporting civic issues, finding organizations, understanding CivicConnect, community engagement, or platform features. What would you like to know? ü§îüí°
